message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, it's truly a must-have item for anyone looking to elevate their experience. For this exceptional product, I'm offering it to you for $85. I believe this price reflects its value and I'm confident it will be a great addition to your collection.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that price for the premium features and high-quality materials you mentioned.

Thank you for your interest in our premium product, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to accept it at $75. Considering the unique features and high-quality materials used in the product, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. How about considering $80 as the price for the product?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $78. I think that's a fair price considering the features and materials. Can you meet me at $78?

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value and quality of the product, I would like to propose a price of $79 for the product. This price reflects the unique features and materials used while also being competitive in the market.
I'm still not convinced that $79 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to pay $76, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at $76?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your offer carefully and I'm willing to negotiate further. Based on our discussion, I propose a price of $77 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between the value of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still not convinced that $77 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to pay $75, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at $75?
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $75 as the price for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value and quality of the product.
